Modul model

Package de.kaiser.model.font

package de.kaiser.model.font
Contains the data models for defining and configuring fonts.

This package provides the foundation for the entire font management of the library. It allows the declaration of font families and their various types (bold, italic, etc.) and provides named, reusable font styles that can be referenced in the StyleSheet.

Architecture

The system is based on three central concepts:
  1. FontFamily: Defines a font family (e.g., "Open Sans"). It bundles a list of FontType objects.
  2. FontType: Represents a single font type. It links a physical font file (e.g., "OpenSans-Bold.ttf") with a specific font-weight and font-style.
Seit:
1.0
  • Klasse
    Beschreibung
    FontFamily
    Represents a font family, which is a collection of font types (e.g., regular, bold, italic versions of the same font).
    FontFamilyList
     
    FontStyleValue
    Enum representing different font style values: normal, italic, and oblique.
    FontType
    Represents a specific font type within a font family, linking a font file to a specific style (e.g., "italic") and weight (e.g., "700").
